data.text:
Wilson, Harry Leon

Bunker Bean

Edition: First Thus

Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good

Jacket Condition: Very Good

Binding: Hardcover

ISBN: B00088AQ7G

First Edition Thus, First Printing. Published by Grosset & Dunlap, 1913. Octavo. Green cloth boards stamped in green. Book is very good. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight and pages crisp. Previous owner name on flyleaf. Dust jacket is very good with shelf wear, edge wear, and tears. Book placed in custom acetate protector. 307 pages plus 4 of ads.
